results.idea: 5-day momentum scaled by volatility
results.description: Core: Capture medium-term momentum divided by recent volatility. SUGGESTION1: applied (uses news_eod_close and news_atr14). SUGGESTION2: not applied (no vector field used). SUGGESTION3: not applied (both coverages >0.6). SUGGESTION4: applied (news_eod_close userCount=1095/alphaCount=2740, news_atr14 userCount=609/alphaCount=3507). KEEP_IN_MINDs: implementation uses 2 datafields and 3 operators, brief and within operator limits. I set confidence = 0.72 based on well-known momentum/volatility efficacy.

results.idea: 1-day reversal (short-term mean reversion)
results.description: Core: Short-term reversal by taking negative 1-day return. SUGGESTION1: not applied (single field news_eod_close) to keep signal clean. SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage high). SUGGESTION4: applied (news_eod_close high user/alpha counts). KEEP_IN_MINDs: one field, one operator; short implementation. I set confidence = 0.60 as intraday reversal is common but lower persistence.

results.idea: Earnings surprise immediate momentum
results.description: Core: After earnings, positive EPS surprise tends to push price; combine eps actual z-score with 1-day return. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eps_actual, news_pct_1min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (both coverages >0.9). SUGGESTION4: applied (news_eps_actual userCount=459/alphaCount=1230; news_pct_1min userCount=218/alphaCount=460). KEEP_IN_MINDs: two datafields, three operators. I set confidence = 0.75 given strong earnings-driven moves.

results.idea: Gap open follow-through (open gap * overnight return)
results.description: Core: Use open gap to predict continuation into session. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_open_gap and news_pct_10min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage news_open_gap=0.6247>0.6; news_pct_10min=0.7657). SUGGESTION4: partial (news_pct_10min lower userCount but acceptable). KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, three operators. Confidence = 0.66.

results.idea: Volatility breakout: ATR change signals big moves
results.description: Core: Rising ATR predicts larger price moves; favor direction of recent returns. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_atr14 and news_eod_close). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed (coverage high). SUGGESTION4: applied (news_atr14 alphaCount high). KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, uses ts_delta and ts_returns (2 ops). Confidence = 0.68.

results.idea: Size-adjusted momentum (momentum scaled by market cap)
results.description: Core: Momentum signal stronger in smaller caps; divide 10-day return by market cap. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close and news_cap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (both coverages >0.8). SUGGESTION4: applied (news_cap userCount=1722/alphaCount=6299). KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, simple ops. Confidence = 0.70.

results.idea: Volume surge continuation (curr_vol / mov_vol * short-term return)
results.description: Core: Large current volume vs 30-day average indicates meaningful moves; combine with 5-min return. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_curr_vol and news_mov_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverages >0.7). SUGGESTION4: partial (news_curr_vol userCount moderate). KEEP_IN_MINDs: two datafields, two operators. Confidence = 0.65.

results.idea: Post-news 1-min continuation filter by volatility
results.description: Core: Use first-minute percent change but downweight noisy names using ATR. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_1min and news_atr14). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied. SUGGESTION4: applied (both fields decent user/alpha counts). KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields and two operators. Confidence = 0.67.

results.idea: VWAP vs news price mean-reversion
results.description: Core: Price divergence from pre-news VWAP tends to revert; use difference between TONLast and pre_vwap. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_ton_last and news_pre_vwap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage pre_vwap 0.8289). SUGGESTION4: applied (both fields used in many alphas). KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, one subtract operator. Confidence = 0.63.

results.idea: Post-news extreme move fade (high exc stddev)
results.description: Core: If after-news high relative to 30-day stddev is extreme, expect mean reversion. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_high_exc_stddev and news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage high). SUGGESTION4: applied (high alphaCount for news_high_exc_stddev). KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, two operators. Confidence = 0.64.

results.idea: Short-interest momentum signal
results.description: Core: High short interest that is decreasing can indicate squeeze potential; combine short_interest change with price return. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_short_interest and news_eod_close). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage short_interest=0.872). SUGGESTION4: applied (short_interest userCount decent). KEEP_IN_MINDs: uses ts_delta and ts_returns (2 fields, 2 ops). Confidence = 0.61.

results.idea: Pre-market gap fade vs post vwap
results.description: Core: Large pre-session gap often reverts to post-session VWAP. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_open_gap and news_post_vwap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (post_vwap coverage 0.9705). SUGGESTION4: partial (open_gap lower userCount but OK). KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields and one subtract. Confidence = 0.59.

results.idea: Relative strength vs index (stock vs SPY)
results.description: Core: Use news_indx_perf which is stock performance minus SPY; rank high relative performers to go long. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_indx_perf only). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage high). SUGGESTION4: applied (alphaCount high). KEEP_IN_MINDs: single field, short. Confidence = 0.66.

results.idea: High tick activity continuation
results.description: Core: Large tot_ticks indicates institutional flow; combine with short-term return. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_tot_ticks and news_pct_10min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage high). SUGGESTION4: applied (news_tot_ticks userCount=673 alphaCount=1422). KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, multiplication. Confidence = 0.62.

results.idea: Large after-news up move continuation (max_up_ret filter)
results.description: Core: If after-news max up return is large but not volatile, follow the direction. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_max_up_ret and news_vol_stddev). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (both coverages >0.84). SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, two ops. Confidence = 0.60.

results.idea: Range breakout scaled by range standardization
results.description: Core: Use session_range relative to 30-day range stddev to detect breakouts. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_session_range and news_range_stddev). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: applied if coverage <0.6; session_range coverage=0.4236 so ts_backfill recommended but instead I avoid backfill by using range_stddev (coverage 0.6172). SUGGESTION4: partial (range_stddev userCount low). KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, division. Confidence = 0.54 (weaker due to session_range coverage).

results.idea: Momentum filtered by PE (cheap winners)
results.description: Core: Favor momentum in low PE stocks (value+momentum). SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close and news_pe_ratio). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage pe_ratio=0.9662). SUGGESTION4: applied (news_pe_ratio userCount=1187/alphaCount=2682). KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, divide momentum by pe. Confidence = 0.71.

results.idea: Post-news microstructure: first 30s strength
results.description: Core: Use 30-second percent (news_pct_30sec) as immediate sentiment indicator for short trades. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30sec only). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage 0.9673). SUGGESTION4: applied (userCount moderate). KEEP_IN_MINDs: single field, short. Confidence = 0.63.

results.idea: Overbought short via high intraday percentile
results.description: Core: Use news_mins_20_pct_up (time to 20% up) short if very fast. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_mins_20_pct_up only). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed (coverage high). SUGGESTION4: applied (alphaCount decent). KEEP_IN_MINDs: field has single use. Confidence = 0.50 (rare events).

results.idea: Earnings surprise reversal on extreme post-move
results.description: Core: If EPS actual is high but post-news max up is extreme, fade the move. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eps_actual and news_max_up_ret). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage high). SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, subtraction and reverse. Confidence = 0.58.

results.idea: Price/volume divergence (price drop on rising volume) mean reversion
results.description: Core: When price drops but current volume > mov_vol, expect rebound. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_10min and news_ratio_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: news_ratio_vol coverage=0.5122<0.6 so I would ts_backfill; SUGGESTION3: applied. SUGGESTION4: partial. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, backfill used once. Confidence = 0.55.

results.idea: Trailing volatility contraction breakout
results.description: Core: Low volstddev then sudden vol spike predicts directional breakout. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_vol_stddev and news_atr14). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage vol_stddev=0.9672). SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, product of signals. Confidence = 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on low 30-day range z-score
results.description: Core: Momentum in structurally quiet stocks often offers cleaner signals; use range stddev downweight. SUGGESTION1: applied (ts_returns(news_eod_close,10) and news_range_stddev). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (range_stddev coverage 0.6172 borderline). SUGGESTION4: partial. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two inputs and divide op. Confidence = 0.60.

results.idea: After-news imbalance proxy: ton_last vs main_vwap
results.description: Core: Difference between TONLast and main_vwap signals immediate directional pressure. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_ton_last and news_main_vwap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (both coverages ~0.97). SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields and one subtract. Confidence = 0.62.

results.idea: Short-term volatility-normalized breakout
results.description: Core: 1-minute percent change normalized by ATR indicates true breakout. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_1min and news_atr14). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, simple divide. Confidence = 0.69.

results.idea: Earnings beat continuation if volume above 30-day avg
results.description: Core: EPS beat combined with volume surge favors continuation. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eps_actual and news_ratio_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: news_ratio_vol coverage=0.5122<0.6 so apply ts_backfill to ratio field. SUGGESTION4: applied for eps. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields and backfill + multiply ops. Confidence = 0.68.

results.idea: Momentum momentum: 20-day returns scaled by 5-day acceleration
results.description: Core: Capture accelerating momentum by dividing 20-day return by delta of 5-day return. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close only via ts_*). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied (eod_close widely used). KEEP_IN_MINDs: uses ts_returns and ts_delta, within op limits. Confidence = 0.70.

results.idea: Microstructure squeeze signal: rapid up ticks + low available float proxy
results.description: Core: Combine fast up-minute moves with high short_interest to detect squeezes. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_mins_1_chg and news_short_interest). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverages >0.8). SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, multiply. Confidence = 0.57.

results.idea: Overreaction fade using max_down_ret
results.description: Core: Large after-news down move often partially reverts; use max_dn_ret negative signal. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_max_dn_ret only). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage high). SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single field, reverse. Confidence = 0.62.

results.idea: Intraday mean reversion using ton_last vs eod_vwap
results.description: Core: If TONLast >> eod_vwap, expect reversion. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_ton_last and news_eod_vwap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, subtract. Confidence = 0.61.

results.idea: Low-liquidity momentum (mov_vol small but pct move big)
results.description: Core: Big percent changes in low-average-volume stocks more persistent. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_10min and news_mov_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (mov_vol coverage 0.8046). SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, divide. Confidence = 0.56.

results.idea: Pre-market gap continuation filtered by 60-min move
results.description: Core: If open gap and strong 60-min post-news move align, continue. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_open_gap and news_pct_60min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: partial. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, multiply. Confidence = 0.63.

results.idea: Post-news dispersion: stock vs index gap
results.description: Core: Use news_indx_perf to find stocks diverging from SPY and play continuation or fade. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_indx_perf only). SUGGESTION2/3: not applied. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single field; short. Confidence = 0.65.

results.idea: Large post-news upmove with low range stddev continuation
results.description: Core: When max_up_ret is big but range stddev low, continuation is more likely. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_max_up_ret and news_rangestddev). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: rangestddev coverage=0.6172 borderline but acceptable. SUGGESTION4: partial. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, divide. Confidence = 0.58.

results.idea: Intraday momentum normalized by ticks
results.description: Core: Normalize percent move by tot_ticks to filter out noisy ticky names. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30min and news_tot_ticks). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (both coverages high). SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields; divide. Confidence = 0.64.

results.idea: Short-term zscore momentum
results.description: Core: Cross-sectionally zscore the 5-day returns to pick extremes. SUGGESTION1: applied (ts_returns(news_eod_close,5) via ts_zscore). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied (eod_close widely used). KEEP_IN_MINDs: single datafield, one operator. Confidence = 0.68.

results.idea: Earnings volume-weighted continuation
results.description: Core: After EPS, if current volume > 30-day and price moved up, continue. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eps_actual and news_ratio_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: ratio_vol coverage <0.6 so use ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, backfill and multiply. Confidence = 0.67.

results.idea: Momentum times liquidity (favor momentum in liquid names)
results.description: Core: Multiply 10-day return by mov_vol to favor liquid movers. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close and news_mov_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields and one multiply. Confidence = 0.66.

results.idea: Range contraction mean reversion
results.description: Core: Extremely small session_range relative to avg suggests upcoming reversion. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_session_range only). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: session_range coverage <0.6 so ts_backfill recommended; SUGGESTION3: applied. SUGGESTION4: not applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single field plus backfill. Confidence = 0.52.

results.idea: Quick fade of first-minute spike
results.description: Core: Big 1-min spike often fades in next minutes — use news_pct_1min negative. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_1min only). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage high). SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single op. Confidence = 0.64.

results.idea: Momentum skewed by PE outliers
results.description: Core: Penalize momentum in extremely high PE names using winsorization by pe_ratio. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close and news_pe_ratio). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, divide and winsorize (2 ops). Confidence = 0.69.

results.idea: Post-news continuation when TONLast near session high
results.description: Core: If TONLast close to EODHigh, continuation likely. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_ton_last and news_eod_high). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, ratio. Confidence = 0.60.

results.idea: Short-term momentum scaled by total ticks
results.description: Core: Favor 1-day movers with strong tick activity: 1-day return * tot_ticks. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close and news_tot_ticks). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, multiply. Confidence = 0.63.

results.idea: Fade extreme intraday vwap divergence
results.description: Core: If main_vwap far from eod_vwap, expect reversion. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_main_vwap and news_eod_vwap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: partial. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, subtract. Confidence = 0.58.

results.idea: Acceleration filter: 5-day return vs 20-day return
results.description: Core: Stocks accelerating (shorter-term > longer-term returns) are favored. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close only). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single field, divide two ts_returns. Confidence = 0.67.

results.idea: Overnight reversal via prevday return
results.description: Core: Use previous-day behavior (news_prev_day_ret) to predict overnight reversal intraday. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_prev_day_ret only). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage 0.7311). SUGGESTION4: partial. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single field. Confidence = 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by volatility rank
results.description: Core: Favor momentum in low historical stddev names: divide 10-day return by ts_std_dev. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close and ts_std_dev on same field). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single datafield, 2 ops. Confidence = 0.68.

results.idea: Post-news gap continuation when SPY aligned
results.description: Core: If stock and SPY both gap same direction (use news_spy_last and news_ton_last), continuation likely. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_spy_last and news_ton_last). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, multiply signs. Confidence = 0.62.

results.idea: High intraday percentile continuation using mins_5 metrics
results.description: Core: Fast 5-minute moves (news_mins_5_pct_up) indicate momentum. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_mins_5_pct_up only). SUGGESTION2: vector not used. SUGGESTION3: not needed (coverage 0.9214). SUGGESTION4: partial. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single field. Confidence = 0.58.

results.idea: Earnings surprise vs market reaction
results.description: Core: If EPS actual positive but news_result_vs_index negative, potential alpha (stock-specific mispricing). SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eps_actual and news_result_vs_index). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverages high). SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, multiply. Confidence = 0.66.

results.idea: Micro momentum: 30-min percent change scaled by ATR
results.description: Core: Use news_pct_30min normalized by ATR to find meaningful micro moves. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30min and news_atr14). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, divide. Confidence = 0.67.

results.idea: Open-interest like signal: prev_vol sudden drop then spike
results.description: Core: Very low previous volume then today big current volume signals unusual flow (news_prev_vol and news_curr_vol). SUGGESTION1: applied (news_prev_vol and news_curr_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: news_prev_vol coverage low (0.0374) so ts_backfill used. SUGGESTION4: prev_vol userCount low so confidence reduced. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields and backfill. Confidence = 0.46.

results.idea: Price momentum adjusted by reported cap (risk scaling)
results.description: Core: Scale momentum by sqrt of market cap to control position sizing; favor smaller caps. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close and news_cap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, sqrt and divide. Confidence = 0.65.

results.idea: Earnings buzz: newrecord novelty continuation
results.description: Core: First instance news (newrecord=1) often moves more; multiply novelty by short-term return. SUGGESTION1: applied (nws12_mainz_newrecord and news_pct_10min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverages high so not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, multiply. Confidence = 0.60.

results.idea: High ATR names: prefer mean reversion
results.description: Core: Extremely volatile names often mean-revert intraday; use ts_zscore on ATR and reverse 1-day return. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_atr14 and news_eod_close). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, reverse and zscore. Confidence = 0.59.

results.idea: Pre-news VWAP vs TONLast momentum
results.description: Core: Positive difference TONLast - pre_vwap signals buyers; use sign for trade trigger. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_ton_last and news_pre_vwap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields and sign. Confidence = 0.62.

results.idea: Continuation if both first-minute and first-10min agree
results.description: Core: Multiply signals from 1-min and 10-min percent to reduce noise. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_1min and news_pct_10min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, multiply. Confidence = 0.63.

results.idea: 24-hr momentum using prevclose vs eodclose
results.description: Core: Compare prevclose and eod_close to capture overnight sentiment. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_prev_close and news_eod_close). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: news_prev_close coverage low (0.1728) so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: prev_close low userCount so confidence reduced. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields and backfill. Confidence = 0.48.

results.idea: Short squeeze candidate score
results.description: Core: High short_interest * sudden up ticks indicates squeeze candidates. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_short_interest and news_mins_3_chg). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed (coverage high). SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, multiply. Confidence = 0.60.

results.idea: Fade after large one-minute upmove if volstddev high
results.description: Core: Large 1-min up moves in high volstddev names are noise; fade. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_1min and news_vol_stddev). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields and if logic reversed. Confidence = 0.61.

results.idea: Momentum cross-check: 5-day return vs sector mean (group idea placeholder)
results.description: Core: Favor stocks beating their sector momentum. SUGGESTION1: uses news_eod_close; SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: group operators required for sector are not used here to keep implementation simple (user must apply group_neutralize externally). I set confidence = 0.64.

results.idea: High-spread fade via range stddev
results.description: Core: Large session range relative to 30-day stddev indicates overreaction; fade the extremity. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_range_stddev only). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed (coverage borderline 0.6172). SUGGESTION4: partial. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single field. Confidence = 0.56.

results.idea: Momentum sign agreement across timeframes
results.description: Core: Require 1-day and 10-day returns to agree (both positive) to trade. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close only). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single field and logical ops. Confidence = 0.66.

results.idea: High-volume breakout scaled by moving average of ticks
results.description: Core: Large current vol relative to mov_vol combined with tot_ticks indicates persistent move. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_curr_vol, news_mov_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverages OK). SUGGESTION4: partial. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, divide and multiply. Confidence = 0.62.

results.idea: Fade extremes after large max_up_amt
results.description: Core: Large dollar up move after news (max_up_amt) often mean-reverts. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_max_up_amt only). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single field. Confidence = 0.57.

results.idea: Price momentum normalized by marketcap quartile
results.description: Core: Apply stronger weight to momentum in smaller cap quartiles using bucketed cap (user to bucket externally). SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close and news_cap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: keeps implementation short; user should bucket externally. Confidence = 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum amplified when result_vs_index positive
results.description: Core: If stock outperforms index post-news, amplify momentum. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_result_vs_index and news_eod_close). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields and multiply. Confidence = 0.65.

results.idea: Fade small-cap extreme moves (cap filter)
results.description: Core: Very small caps tend to overreact; dampen extreme short-term returns by cap. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close and news_cap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, divide. Confidence = 0.58.

results.idea: Short-term continuation when minutes to 1% move is small
results.description: Core: If it took few minutes to move 1% (news_mins_1_pct_up small), continuation likely. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_mins_1_pct_up only). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed (coverage 0.8309). SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single field, reverse. Confidence = 0.60.

results.idea: Continuation when eod_vwap above pre_vwap
results.description: Core: If eod_vwap > pre_vwap then buyers dominated post-news; go long. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_vwap and news_pre_vwap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, subtract. Confidence = 0.62.

results.idea: Weakness chasing short using mins_3_pct_dn
results.description: Core: Fast 3-minute down moves indicate weakness; short. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_mins_3_pct_dn only). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed (coverage 0.9174). SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single field. Confidence = 0.59.

results.idea: Volume-adjusted continuation: pct_120min * mov_vol
results.description: Core: Strong 2-hour move in high-average-volume names indicates continuation. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_120min and news_mov_vol). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed (coverage high). SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, multiply. Confidence = 0.61.

results.idea: Post-news momentum scaled by PE and ATR
results.description: Core: Favor momentum in low-PE, low-ATR names to reduce noise. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close, news_pe_ratio, news_atr14) — but limit to 2 datafields per constraints, so combine pe and returns only. SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: constrained to 2 datafields; keep simple. Confidence = 0.66.

results.idea: Fade intraday extremes using group-neutralization note
results.description: Core: Extremes often sector-driven; user should group_neutralize externally. SUGGESTION1: not applied in code (group operator avoided per KEEP_IN_MIND). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: instruction to apply group_neutralize outside; confidence=0.60.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by 30-day vol spike
results.description: Core: Favor momentum when current volume significantly above 30-day average and volstddev moderate. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_ratio_vol and news_vol_stddev). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: ratio_vol coverage low so ts_backfill used. SUGGESTION4: partial. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields and backfill. Confidence = 0.58.

results.idea: Collapse signal: tiny 20-day movement with sudden 1-day pop
results.description: Core: Long names with small 20-day return but big 1-day jump often revert. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close only). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single field and if logic. Confidence = 0.57.

results.idea: Post-news momentum amplified by index outperformance
results.description: Core: If stock outperforms SPY post-news, bet more on its momentum. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_result_vs_index and news_eod_close). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields and multiply. Confidence = 0.65.

results.idea: Quick mean-revert after first 5-min peak
results.description: Core: If 5-min percent hits extreme, expect reversion to 30-min mean. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_5_min and news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: partial. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, reverse relation. Confidence = 0.60.

results.idea: Earnings surprise velocity: eps zscore * 10-min move
results.description: Core: Combine EPS surprise magnitude with 10-minute percent move to detect sustainable moves. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eps_actual and news_pct_10min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, multiply. Confidence = 0.69.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by trading range stability
results.description: Core: Favor momentum in names with low range stddev; divide return by range stddev. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close and news_range_stddev). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: range_stddev coverage borderline 0.6172 but acceptable. SUGGESTION4: partial. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields. Confidence = 0.62.

results.idea: Fade post-news micro spike when session_range large
results.description: Core: If session range already large, an extra spike is noise—fade 1-min spike scaled by session_range. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_1min and news_session_range). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: session_range coverage low (0.4236) so ts_backfill used. SUGGESTION4: partial. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields and backfill. Confidence = 0.53.

results.idea: Directional conviction: pct_30min * tot_ticks
results.description: Core: Multiply 30-min move by total ticks to find conviction. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_30min and news_tot_ticks). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed (coverage high). SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, multiply. Confidence = 0.64.

results.idea: Momentum fade in extremely high PE names
results.description: Core: Reverse short-term momentum for very high PE names. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close and news_pe_ratio). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields and conditional reverse (simple reverse used). Confidence = 0.56.

results.idea: Post-news sustained move when 10-min and 30-min agree
results.description: Core: Require same sign for 10-min and 30-min percent moves to trade. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_10min and news_pct_30min). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields and logical AND. Confidence = 0.63.

results.idea: Small-cap reversal after big 1-day jump
results.description: Core: Small caps that jump >X% in 1 day often revert; use cap to filter. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close and news_cap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, logical conditions. Confidence = 0.55.

results.idea: Fade extreme minutes-to-move metrics
results.description: Core: Very quick moves to percent thresholds (e.g., mins_2_pct_up small) are often unsustainable; fade. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_mins_2_pct_up only). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage low for some mins fields; this one coverage 0.2845 <0.6 so ts_backfill used. SUGGESTION4: not applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single field with backfill. Confidence = 0.49.

results.idea: Earnings continuation only if max_up_ret strong and volstddev low
results.description: Core: After earnings, require large max_up_ret and low vol_stddev to go long. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_max_up_ret and news_vol_stddev). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, logical AND. Confidence = 0.68.

results.idea: Price momentum adjusted by eod_vwap gap
results.description: Core: Favor momentum when EOD close remains above eod_vwap (buyer control). SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close and news_eod_vwap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, sign and multiply. Confidence = 0.62.

results.idea: High volatility name reversal using ts_kurtosis
results.description: Core: Names with high kurtosis prone to spikes—fade short-term. SUGGESTION1: applied (ts_kurtosis(news_eod_close,30) only). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single op. Confidence = 0.54.

results.idea: Volatility breakout confirmed by ticks and vwap
results.description: Core: If pct_30min large and tot_ticks high and TONLast > main_vwap, take direction. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields and multiply. Confidence = 0.63.

results.idea: Short-term mean reversion after extreme 90-min move
results.description: Core: Very large 90-minute moves often partially revert; reverse news_pct_90min. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_90min only). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage high so not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single operator. Confidence = 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum confidence by low group std (instructional)
results.description: Core: Prefer momentum picks in groups with low dispersion (user to compute group std-dev externally). SUGGESTION1: not applied programmatically (group ops avoided). results.idea: Price/ATR breakout using ts_max_diff
results.description: Core: If current price near 30-day max (ts_max_diff small) and ATR rising, expect continuation. SUGGESTION1: applied (ts_max_diff on news_eod_close and news_atr14). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single field used with ts_max_diff and ts_delta; within op limits. Confidence = 0.64.

results.idea: Price reversal if pre-news open gap huge vs ATR
results.description: Core: Large open_gap relative to ATR often corrects. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_open_gap and news_atr14). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed (open_gap coverage 0.6247). SUGGESTION4: partial. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields and divide. Confidence = 0.59.

results.idea: Fade when eod_high exc stddev extreme
results.description: Core: Very high_exc_stddev implies over-extension; fade. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_high_exc_stddev only). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: single operator. Confidence = 0.60.

results.idea: Short-term continuation when pre_vwap < ton_last < main_vwap
results.description: Core: TONLast between pre-session and main VWAP suggests buyer accumulation; go with direction of short-term return. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_ton_last and news_pre_vwap/main_vwap but limited to two fields, use ton_last and main_vwap). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, comparison. Confidence = 0.61.

results.idea: Momentum weighted by inverse PE (value tilt)
results.description: Core: Multiply momentum by inverse PE to favor cheap momentum names. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_eod_close and news_pe_ratio). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields, inverse and multiply. Confidence = 0.72.

results.idea: Immediate 120-min continuation filter by volstddev
results.description: Core: Use 120-min percent with vol_stddev low to pick sustainable moves. SUGGESTION1: applied (news_pct_120min and news_vol_stddev). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION4: applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two fields and logical condition. Confidence = 0.63.
